description:
29 years old. He`s a former Captain in the EFA. He graduated with top scores in his class, and has treated Tetsuya with disrespect since their school days. He has only his job on his mind, and will do anything to succeed his mission, even if it makes him look heartless.
His family died during the L5 Campaign due to Ingram`s betrayl. This caused him to grow bitter, making him eventually join the Shadow Mirror forces due to a similar belief in ideals, in addition to him wanting revenge against the Hagane`s forces. During Operation Plantagenet he dealt a devasting blow to the Hagane, killing Daitetsu in the process.
During the battle near the White Star, he was defeated by Tetsuya. Although his ship was badly damaged, he did not die. His current whereabouts are unknown.
name: Lee Linjun
